alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 1:13PM MST until February 04 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MST /7 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas and east central and northeast Colorado. * WHEN...From 6 PM MST /7 PM CST/ this evening to 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be sure to dress appropriately for the commute to work or school Friday morning has frostbite can occur in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
